item.description:
There has been some interest in a possible trip to the MFA to partake in some art and writing.

General Idea:

Walk around the museum for about an hour and find a piece of artwork that inspires you. Use it to write a short piece of fiction.

Meetup in the Museum's cafe, and share writing with other group members.

perhaps, head out for dinner and coffee/drinks afterwards .

Plan is subject to change, but this is the general idea.

It has been awhile since I last visited the MFA, so I see this as a great opportunity to combine two passions! The general admission is $17 for adults over 18. I am not currently aware of any special discounts for students or teachers, but if you are a member of the MFA admission is free. I will look into this asap.

Hope people will be able to join and please feel free to suggest any ideas for alternative activities in the future.

Alexa
item.name: Writing at the Museum of Fine Arts
